statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_risk_assessment;
SELECT supplier_id, financial_data FROM supplier_risk_assessment ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT past_performance_records, financial_data FROM supplier_risk_assessment ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT industry_trends, supplier_id FROM supplier_risk_assessment ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT financial_data->>'revenue' AS revenue, industry_trends FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_id, industry_trends, past_performance_records FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE financial_data->>'profit_margin' > 0.15;
SELECT supplier_id, financial_data, industry_trends FROM supplier_risk_assessment ORDER BY financial_data->>'revenue' DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, past_performance_records, financial_data->>'profit_margin' AS profit_margin FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE industry_trends ILIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, financial_data FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, industry_trends FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT assessment_date, risk_score FROM risk_assessments WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, financial_data FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, industry_trends FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, financial_data FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT supplier_name, industry_trends FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, financial_data->'revenue' as revenue FROM suppliers INNER JOIN financial_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE profit > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT supplier_name, assessment_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN risk_assessments ON suppliers.supplier_id = risk_assessments.supplier_id WHERE risk_score > 8
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_name) < 10
SELECT MAX(profit) as max_profit FROM financial_data
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, industry_trends FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, financial_data FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, annual_revenue, profit_margin FROM suppliers JOIN financial_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, industry_trends FROM suppliers WHERE industry_trends->>'trend_rating' > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, financial_data->>'annual_revenue' AS annual_revenue FROM suppliers JOIN financial_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id;

SELECT risk_assessments.supplier_id, risk_assessments.assessment_date, risk_assessments.overall_rating, financial_data.annual_revenue FROM risk_assessments JOIN financial_data ON risk_assessments.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, financial_data.annual_revenue, industry_trends.trend_name FROM suppliers JOIN financial_data ON suppliers.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id JOIN industry_trends ON suppliers.supplier_id = industry_trends.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 100000
SELECT supplier_name, industry_category FROM supplier_risk_assessment ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, financial_health_rating FROM supplier_risk_assessment WHERE financial_health_rating < 3
SELECT * FROM industry_trends WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT supplier_name, cash_flow FROM financial_data JOIN supplier_risk_assessment ON financial_data.supplier_id = supplier_risk_assessment.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, industry_category, financial_health_rating FROM supplier_risk_assessment;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT trend_description, risk_level, impact_rating FROM industry_trends ORDER BY impact_rating DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, revenue, net_profit, cash_flow FROM supplier_risk_assessment JOIN financial_data ON supplier_risk_assessment.supplier_id = financial_data.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, contract_completion_status FROM supplier_risk_assessment JOIN past_performance_records ON supplier_risk_assessment.supplier_id = past_performance_records.supplier_id WHERE delivery_performance_rating > 3;
